amendment.description: Amendment provides $12 million for the Bulletproof Vest Partnership Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding (by offset) for COPS bulletproof vests by $12,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lynch amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Lynch.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lynch amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
